授業方法:
Session 1 will be held face-to-face. Session 2 and onwards will be held simultaneously via Zoom through a two-way online broadcast. Please stand by in Zoom at least 5 minutes before the class starts. In addition to teacher instruction students will work independently, with partners, in small groups and in whole class activities to practice and develop TOEFL exam skills.

(Information ONLY for students permitted to take classes online: Where necessary and only for students permitted to take classes online the university will provide the means to participate in the classes on the day and time scheduled simultaneously via Zoom through a two-way online broadcast.)

第1回: Introduction and overview of the test.  Writing skills, question 2: independent
第2回: Reading skills, question types, strategies, diagnostic reading pre-test and an overview of the reading homework + Listening skills, question types, strategies and diagnostic listening pre-test.
第3回: Listening practice skills: Understanding gist and details + Speaking skills, question types, strategies and diagnostic speaking pre-test.
第4回: Listening review. Listening practice skills: Understand the function + Speaking skills: TOEFL question 1.
第6回: Listening practice skills: Understand the speaker's stance + Speaking skills: TOEFL question 2.
第7回: Listening practice skills: Understand the organization + Speaking skills: TOEFL question 3.
第8回: Listening practice skills: Understand relationships + Speaking skills: TOEFL question 4.
第10回: Listening skills: Review + Speaking skills: TOEFL question 5.
第11回: Listening test + Speaking skills: TOEFL question 6.
トピック.授業外学習2: Review each lesson and complete the regular homework assignments in order to be prepared for the following class.  This should take between one to two hours per class lesson.
